latestVersion.confidentialityDeclaration: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/
latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).

dsDescriptionValue.value: To examine how the influence of various modernizing forces affect the income level of the villagers, and how income distribution among household has changed over time.

keywordValue.value: Demographic characteristics, household assets, landholdings, input-output in rice production, income growth

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 51;
